name: Mini Bar Bowling 3D
description:
Mini Bar Bowling 3D is a very interesting and realistic bowling game. It has really fantastic rendering and realistic physical simulation which can simulate real environment in a bowling alley. The game is also quite easy to play.
How To Play:
1. Drag the ball to left or right to position it.
2. Put finger on ball and flip to pins to throw.
3. Gesture curve on the screen to rotate ball.
